name: Aria (itch) (Smos Bois)
description:
Aria is a short 3D adventure game where you can explore the forest with the power of melodies.

You play as Aria, a young musician, specialised in violin, living in the forest. One day you meet a little create named Alto. Alto can change into a violin, which Aria can play. After they meet, something happens in the forest. Aria and Alto go out to investigate.

This game was made within a short period of time (6-8 weeks), and still has some faults, so keep this in mind when you play.
